snippet.title: Suikoden I&II HD Remaster Gate Rune and Dunan Unification Wars – Nintendo Direct: Partner Showcase
snippet.description:
Suikoden I&II HD Remaster Gate Rune and Dunan Unification Wars is coming to Nintendo Switch on March 6th, 2025! Wishlist today: https://www.nintendo.com/us/store/products/suikoden-i-and-ii-hd-remaster-gate-rune-and-dunan-unification-wars-switch/?utm_source=SW&utm_medium=soytnoa&utm_campaign=P1057-01&utm_id=P1057-01

A hero's destiny is written in the Stars! The legendary Konami JRPGs Suikoden I and Suikoden II have now been remastered in HD!

#Suikoden #NintendoDirect #NintendoSwitch

Visit Nintendo.com for more info: https://www.nintendo.com/us/

Subscribe for more Nintendo fun: https://goo.gl/HYYsot

Follow Nintendo of America
X/Twitter: https://twitter.com/NintendoAmerica
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/NintendoAmerica
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/nintendoamerica
Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/nintendo
